game.name: Dinkum
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 딩컴은 거친 호주 아웃백을 닮은 섬에서 펼쳐지는 시뮬레이션 게임입니다. 농업, 사냥, 채광, 낚시, 채집을 통해 자원을 모아 마을을 확장하고, 친구들과 어울리며 딩컴의 특별한 매력을 경험해보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dinkum is a survival life simulation game set on an island inspired by the rugged Australian outback. Farm, hunt, mine, fish, and forage to gather resources, expand your town, and discover what makes Dinkum so special—either solo or with friends.

reviewHighlights.text: it's good for someone who want some peace after long time work, i can't even describe how chill am i to do every activity in this game.
I jumped into Dinkum not fully knowing what to expect… and ended up having an absolute blast. The game nails that “just one more in-game day” feeling....
